EmailTemplate.name: *WORKFLOW Application Initial Criteria Failure email
EmailTemplate.subject: Please review your Step Forward application!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Step Forward
Please review your Step Forward application!
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for applying for Step Forward and we’re glad you’re interested in the programme.
Unfortunately your application has indicated that you may not be eligible to apply for Step Forward.
During the application process we understand that you answered 'No' to at least one of the following questions:
Do you have the right to work in the UK? Have you lived in the UK (or EU) for the past 3 years? Do you have GCSE English Grade C or above or equivalent (for example Level 2 Functional Skills)? Do you have GCSE Maths Grade C or above or equivalent (for example Level 2 Functional Skills)? I am available for Induction Week I am available for my first day at work
If you answered ‘No’ to at least one of the questions above then unfortunately we will not be able to take your application any further.
We will keep you on our database and if your circumstances change, please do contact us.
If you think there has been a mistake or you have a question regarding your application, please email us at step.forward@the-challenge.org or call 0203 542 2400.
Best wishes,
Step Forward
